post.description: GET a PAT token for creating and deleting deployment targets in an environment.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: ID of the environment in which deployment targets are managed.

definition.description: Definition of the environment deployment execution owner

finishTime.description: Finish time of the environment deployment execution

id.description: Id of the Environment deployment execution history record

owner.description: Owner of the environment deployment execution record

planType.description: Plan type of the environment deployment execution record

queueTime.description: Queue time of the environment deployment execution

requestIdentifier.description: Request identifier of the Environment deployment execution history record

result.description: Result of the environment deployment execution

startTime.description: Start time of the environment deployment execution

createdBy.description: Identity reference of the user who created the Environment.

lastModifiedBy.description: Identity reference of the user who last modified the Environment.

lastModifiedOn.description: Last modified time of the Environment

tags.description: Tags of the Environment Resource Reference.

providerType.description: Provider type (CustomProvider or AzureKubernetesServiceProvider) of the resource to be updated

assignedAgentCloudRequest.description: The agent cloud request that's currently associated with this agent.

assignedRequest.description: The request which is currently assigned to this agent.

createdOn.description: Date on which this agent was created.

lastCompletedRequest.description: The last request which was completed by this agent.

maxParallelism.description: Maximum job parallelism allowed for this agent.

statusChangedOn.description: Date on which the last connectivity status change occurred.

systemCapabilities.description: System-defined capabilities supported by this agent's host. Warning: To set capabilities use the PUT method, PUT will completely overwrite existing capabilities.

userCapabilities.description: User-defined capabilities supported by this agent's host. Warning: To set capabilities use the PUT method, PUT will completely overwrite existing capabilities.

TaskAgentAuthorization.description: Provides data necessary for authorizing the agent using OAuth 2.0 authentication flows.

authorizationUrl.description: Endpoint used to obtain access tokens from the configured token service.

publicKey.description: Public key used to verify the identity of this agent.

TaskAgentJobRequest.description: A job request for an agent.

definition.description: The pipeline definition associated with this request

demands.description: A list of demands required to fulfill this request.

hostId.description: The host which triggered this request.

jobId.description: ID of the job resulting from this request.

jobName.description: Name of the job resulting from this request.

lockedUntil.description: The deadline for the agent to renew the lock.

owner.description: The pipeline associated with this request

planId.description: Internal ID for the orchestration plan connected with this request.

planType.description: Internal detail representing the type of orchestration plan.

poolId.description: The ID of the pool this request targets

queueId.description: The ID of the queue this request targets

reservedAgent.description: The agent allocated for this request.

scopeId.description: Scope of the pipeline; matches the project ID.

serviceOwner.description: The service which owns this request.

assignTime.description: The date/time this request was assigned.

finishTime.description: The date/time this request was finished.

queueTime.description: The date/time this request was queued.

receiveTime.description: The date/time this request was receieved by an agent.

isHosted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not this pool is managed by the service.

isLegacy.description: Determines whether the pool is legacy.

values.description: TaskAgentPool backed by the Elastic pool service
Set to true if agents are re-imaged after each TaskAgentJobRequest
Set to true if agents are held for investigation after a TaskAgentJobRequest failure

poolType.description: Gets or sets the type of the pool

values.description: A typical pool of task agents

size.description: Gets the current size of the pool.

TaskAgentPublicKey.description: Represents the public key portion of an RSA asymmetric key.

exponent.description: Gets or sets the exponent for the public key.

modulus.description: Gets or sets the modulus for the public key.

enabled.description: Whether or not this agent should run jobs.

status.description: Whether or not the agent is online.

currentState.description: Current state of this agent update.

requestTime.description: Date on which this update was requested.

sourceVersion.description: Source agent version of the update.

targetVersion.description: Target agent version of the update.

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialize collections as a single JSON object on the wire.

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.2.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.2.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.2' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.build_execute: Grants the ability to access build artifacts, including build results, definitions, and requests, and the ability to queue a build, update build properties, and the ability to receive notifications about build events via service hooks.
scopes.vso.build: Grants the ability to access build artifacts, including build results, definitions, and requests, and the ability to receive notifications about build events via service hooks.
